channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
channel.desc: Bridget's brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.
